issue.title: [MATLAB] Create a templated ObjectMap for storing arrow C++ data structures with IDs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12753](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12753). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In order to keep arrow C++ data structures alive for the duration of the wrapping MATLAB object (e.g. arrow.Array), we can store the arrow C++ data structure in a map indexed by a unique ID.
